quote: When Ben came back to me, he said, ""Why are you laying with your face in the sand?""I made sure all the laughter was out of me before I rolled over. ""I think it helps sunburn."" I said.
quote_letters: WHEN BEN CAME BACK TO ME HE SAID WHY ARE YOU LAYING WITH YOUR FACE IN THE SANDI MADE SURE ALL THE LAUGHTER WAS OUT OF ME BEFORE I ROLLED OVER I THINK IT HELPS SUNBURN I SAID
